description.en: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 5% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes a Mature Flowerpot of Love.
description.ar: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 5% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes a Mature Flowerpot of Love.
description.br: Aumenta a vida máxima (HP) em 300 e o Ataque em 5% por 1 hora. Uma vez expirado, se torna um Vaso de Flores Maduras do Amor
description.cns: 1小时内最大HP增300，攻击力+5%。 到期后，它就变成了一个成熟的爱的花钵。
description.de: Erhöht deine HP um +300 und deine Angriffskraft um 5% für eine Stunde. Sobald es abgelaufen ist, verwandelt es sich in einen Mature Flowerpot of Love.
description.fi: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 5% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes a Mature Flowerpot of Love.
description.fil: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 5% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes a Mature Flowerpot of Love.
description.fr: PV max +300, attaque +5% (1h). Se transforme ensuite en Plante vivace.
description.id: Meningkatkan Max HP sebesar +300 dan Attack Power sebesar 5% selama 1 jam. Setelah kedaluwarsa, itu menjadi Mature Flowerpot of Love.
description.it: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 5% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes a Mature Flowerpot of Love.
description.jp: 1時間、最大HPが+300、追加攻撃力+5%増加します。使用後は尊敬の植木鉢になります。
description.kr: 1시간 동안 최대 체력이 +300 증가합니다. 유통기한이 끝나면 존경의 화분이 됩니다.

description.ru: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 5% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes a Mature Flowerpot of Love.
description.sp: Aumenta la Máx. HP en +300 y el Poder de Ataque en un 5% durante 1 hora. Cuando expira, se convierte en una Maceta de Amor Madura.
description.sw: Increases Max HP by +300 and Attack Power by 5% for 1 hour. After it expires, it becomes a Mature Flowerpot of Love.
description.th: เพิ่ม Max HP +300 และ Attack Power 5% เป็นเวลา 1 ชั่วโมง หลังจากหมดอายุจะกลายเป็นMature Flowerpot of Love
description.tw: 最大上限HP+300和攻擊力+5%，持續1小時，時間一到將會變成熟成的愛情盆栽
description.vi: Tăng HP tối đa lên +300 và sức tấn công thêm 5% trong 1 giờ. Sau khi hết hạn, nó sẽ trở thành một Lọ hoa Tình yêu Trưởng thành
